title: Why doesn’t Federico start the 'rivolussione'? — Fellini caricature
other_title_information: Handwritten inscription: 'Perché Federico non fa la rivolussione?'
creator: Renzo Renzi
current_location: Biblioteca Renzo Renzi. Cinema e Fotografia
description: Hand-drawn caricature by Renzo Renzi portraying Federico Fellini with a humorous caption. The drawing later became an emblematic image associated with the Cineteca di Bologna.
notes: Central visual reference for the project title 'The “Revolussion” of Renzo Renzi'.
